publisher.publisher-name: Military Operations Research Society in cooperation with the Military Applications Society (MAS) of the Institute for Operations Research and Management Science (INFORMS)

title-group.article-title: Assessing the Effects of Chemical Attacks On Strategic Deployments

bio.p: LTC John C. Sees, Jr. is the senior military operations research analyst in the Mobilization and Deployment Division at the Center for Army Analysis and was the study director for this project. He has served in command and staff positions from company through corps at a number of locations, including Germany and Ft. Bragg, North Carolina. His source of commissioning was ROTC from the University of Notre Dame, and he holds a Masters of Science in Operations Research from the University of Texas and a Ph.D. in Information Technology from George Mason University.
